ComicInfo.Title: Meet Casey Jones
ComicInfo.Summary: Casey Jones has some serious anger issues to work out and the only way he can do that is by bashing Purple Dragon heads. You know Casey's anger issues are serious if Raphael is the voice of reason during a fight. But when the masked maniac decides to throw down with the meanest turtle in the bunch, Raphael sees red and the rest you'll have to see for yourself.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-27 17:51:59. [CVDB232770]
ComicInfo.Colorist: Alan Wang, Ramil Sunga, Shaun Curtis, Yvonne Poon
ComicInfo.Teams: Purple Dragons, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
